params.name: space
params.description: Warehouse space occupied by each product

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each product to produce

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum((selling_price[p] - manufacturing_cost[p]) * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS)

constraints.name: warehouse_space_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(space[p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total warehouse space cannot exceed 500 square meters

constraints.name: min_tables
constraints.description: At least 10 tables must be produced

constraints.name: min_bookshelves
constraints.description: At least 20 bookshelves must be produced

constraints.name: max_total_items
constraints.description: Total number of items produced cannot exceed 200
